img_above_text:
# Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough

To your left, immediately as you enter the room, you'll find the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine.


After activating the first of the Keeper's Shrines, face away from it and head to the right. Go down the stairs and to the end of the path to find a Meditation Spot.

Return to the Keeper's Shrine and continue past it, following the path to the right. Head down to the slope, collecting the green Wisp on the left and into the center of the room. As you reach the middle, you'll be met by the first of the bosses in this secret area.


Get back to the path and go past the next two bull guards to find the Cave Depths Keeper's Shrine.


Drop down toward the lava and go left into the ice-covered portion of the room. Open the chest on the right to collect Celestial Ribbon and a Mind Core.

Head down to the left, and slide all the way down the slope. Here you'll reach the final Keeper's Shrine of the hidden area, called the Corridor of Fire and Ice.

## Corridor of Fire and Ice
img_below_text: Head right from the Keeper's Shrine and go down the stairs. A cutscene will play as you drop down, and the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast will appear.

img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text describes a walkthrough in a secret area of Bishui Cave, focusing on navigating through various Keeper's Shrines and collecting items like the Celestial Ribbon and Mind Core. It sets the stage for reaching the final Keeper's Shrine in the hidden area, known as the Corridor of Fire and Ice.

Image Summary:
The image depicts a dark cave environment with contrasting elements of fire and ice, aligning with the Corridor of Fire and Ice theme. On the left, there is a glowing lava area, while on the right, there are ice formations. This visual contrast highlights the dual nature of the corridor, which is a significant location within the walkthrough.

Following Text Summary:
The following text instructs the player to proceed right from the Keeper's Shrine and descend the stairs, triggering a cutscene where the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast appears. This indicates an upcoming encounter or challenge within the Corridor of Fire and Ice.
